stimulusHtml:
Dr. Molitor is interested in whether the Big Five trait of openness to experience decreases as people age. Dr. Molitor gives a personality assessment measuring the Big Five trait of openness to a group of 20-year-olds, 40-year-olds, and 60-year-olds on the same day. She then compiles the data to see if older people are less open to experience.

Which research design is Dr. Molitor using?
